html:
6.23.25  9:30 am   I remember you talking somewhere about how obsessive you are about your projects, and that you spend a lot of time polishing them. I was wondering if you had any advice on working on a project for a longer time without falling out of love with it?? For me personally, it feels like I can only make stuff in short bursts of motivation, like in one session, and it often so happens that those bursts don't even last long enough for me to happily finish the songs I started. This really sucks because sometimes it really feels like I'm not using my full potential. Any advice would be highly appreciated, and by the way thank you for everything you do

      you're way ahead of me. i dont know what all this talk is about 'polishing', but i've never even heard of that. never even gotten close to getting anywhere near that far. if i can EVER get anything ANY good, that's considered a very rare and grade-A first class miracle, which under normal circumstances cannot be relied upon or taken for granted

6.23.25  8:28 am   Are pennies that important, other than we treasure them and think that they are cute?

      they can be used to purchase other pennies

6.23.25  7:51 am   do your creative ideas come naturally to you more often than not?

     technically the only way to get a creative idea is naturally. but it's so intoxicating that almost no one can resist the temptation to still try additionally; which of course ruins it

      in any case, what's your brainstorm process like when you want an idea on the spot? 

     sometimes the only way to get relaxed is to just do bad ideas on purpose just to take the pressure off. the paradox is that of course this often immediately launches it, unexpectedly. but then that works so incredibly good that that of course becomes so intoxicating that you again cannot resist temptation to tryhard to somehow repeat the miracle. and then of course it doesnt work. in which case it once again becomes a good idea to do actual bad ones for a while because it's still the only way to take the pressure off

6.23.25  7:22 am   are there any animals you irrationally hate

      yes but i also like them

6.23.25  7:08 am   long or short grain rice

      dare i inquire about medium grain

6.23.25  6:50 am   What's the best movie by Stephen Spielberg?

      that depends whether you like friendly aliens, alien friendship, war, gaming, dinosaurs, check forgery, or filmmaking

6.23.25  6:14 am   If you could invent a new sense (like sight or smell), what would it be and what would it detect?

      i mean, it would be something to have a way to perceive 4 dimensional space. not so much for artistic reasons, this would be more simply in the name of mathematics

6.23.25  5:47 am   do you think that it's rude to say when art is bad?

      no, but it's impossible to know anyway

6.23.25  5:46 am   how big of a head is too big?

      maybe a huge head

6.23.25  5:33 am   How to deal with worrying too much about what I'm "supposed to do"? I struggle keeping up and as a result I can't think of anything else

      who do you think supposes these things, and more importantly, do you think you could imagine what it would be like to be them, supposing those things? can you imagine how it would feel to suppose such things. and then, maybe this is off the subject, but what would you suppose yourself to do, if ever given the chance

6.23.25  5:31 am   how about peanuts?

      every peanut is 2 peanuts

6.23.25  5:29 am   Can you solve a Rubik's cube?

      i've never done it, so my first time would probably take a long time

6.23.25  5:02 am   Why are cats so cool?

      it's partly their high awareness of their physical space and balance

6.23.25  4:53 am   What do you think Plutonium tastes like?

      it's surely way different from the Lay's plutonium flavored potato chip

6.23.25  4:53 am   can you recommend a life in case my current one doesn't play out the way I wanted it to (purely hypothetical of course)?

      it's not time for that yet

6.23.25  4:35 am   Can you recommend a couple songs that you've been enjoying recently that I can listen to too? 

      it's not always good luck for you and i to listen to the exact same thing. that being said, sometimes it is

6.23.25  4:18 am   how do i know when my voice is way too loud? (when mixing with the instrumental) like I genuinely can't tell sometimes

      if you cant tell then it's fine

6.23.25  4:10 am   How does one go about believing in their own achievements? I look at everything I've done, and I can't refute any part of the facts, but it feels fundamentally wrong to claim them. The longer I wait the worse it gets because the list only grows and feels more and more like some kind of peculiar tumor when I should be feeling proud. 

      it's possible that you have not yet justified to yourself your own feelings and reasonings behind why you wanted to achieve these things

6.23.25  4:03 am   What's your favorite kind of sandwich?

      a sandwich sandwich. for those of you following along at home that would be a sandwich in between 2 sandwiches

6.23.25  3:52 am   am i cool

      what do you think that means

6.23.25  3:52 am   Would humanity collapse if it was discovered that God didn't exist?

      first things first, has anyone even been able to describe yet what that means

6.23.25  3:45 am   Do I heat up my food in the air fryer or the oven?

      it depends how much time you have

6.23.25  3:12 am   endless love and affection from strangers must get a little numbing right

      not quite

6.23.25  3:09 am   Did we invent maths or did it exist already?

      it exists way more than we've ever discovered it. we've discovered only little parts of it. and we've only discovered a tiny slice of the many ways to discover it

6.23.25  2:58 am   5 things that define the 2010s

      looking for some alternate definitions beyond just those first 5

6.23.25  2:39 am   Do you like Neil degrasse Tyson? Why do you like him? I love you Mr.Wurtz

      his story about realizing he needed to learn calculus, is pretty inspiring and sensible

6.23.25  2:35 am   opinion on typos?

      skyrocketing in value

6.23.25  2:24 am   Have you ever traveled to a new place where it felt familiar despite it being your first time there?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

6.23.25  2:06 am   how do u hype urself up

      first it may help if you decide whether the hype is true

6.23.25  1:59 am   i was digging a hole, when i realized too late that the hole was dug directly underneath the lincoln memorial, causing it's structural integrity to worsen. how might i be able to fix this before the memorial collapses, reawakening the vengeful spirit of abraham lincoln?

      don't worry. none of this actually happened

6.23.25  1:59 am   Have you got any of these questions wrong?

      yes, i get them all wrong. that is my mission statement, to get questions wrong, except i dont even get them all wrong, so this one's wrong too

6.23.25  1:57 am   what's a question you'd want to be asked right now?

      how do you want me to answer this right now

6.23.25  1:53 am   my cats name is tuna. what do you think about that?

      sometimes i wonder if all these people's pet's names even have a real pet behind them. or is it mostly just about the name

6.23.25  1:11 am   have you ever ridden a unicycle? would you like to in the future?

      im not sure if that would be necessary

6.23.25  1:10 am   I really like the stuff you have made. Why?

      perhaps it's bad

6.23.25  1:06 am   What are your thoughts on Garfield (The cat)?

      more like a person

6.23.25  12:56 am   Why does Godzilla exist?

      originally to do maintenance checks on the building

6.23.25  12:54 am   in what tone or inflection should I read your replies?

      regular

6.23.25  12:49 am   How much do you know about the field of agriculture? I'm a farmer

      i know that you are supposed to plant more than you need

6.23.25  12:31 am   just wondering if there any new songs in the works thanks

      heck yea

6.23.25  12:31 am   rock paper scissors?

      you can go first

6.23.25  12:30 am   how do you barre chords on the guitar

      put one finger across all the strings at the same time on one fret

6.23.25  12:29 am   Do you feel alive?

      yes, thank you for asking

6.23.25  12:20 am   Is this the first parallel universe you've ventured to?

      i was going to say yes but now that i think about it no

6.23.25  12:16 am   What is your favorite Pokemon?

      maybe the yellow one

6.23.25  12:12 am   how do i take over the world

      not necessary, the dam thing takes over itself

6.23.25  12:11 am   I have a question u are excellent at music and bein super cool

      that looks to me more like raw unbridled kindness

6.23.25  12:11 am   Any advice for somebody that's going through an existential crisis

      document your journey

6.23.25  12:09 am   Is Life meaningless?

      it's pretty much everything else, except that

6.23.25  12:06 am   Will you come to New Mexico? 

      i don't see why not
